title: A Dog Owner’s Pride
detail_text: <:th_ch0101/>Look, Shizuku-chan. This is my Shiitake~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Uwaah! So cute~~!! She has such a sweet face. My Ophelia looks like this<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Oooh~, how stylish! As expected of an urban dog~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Fufu, there’s no such thing as an urban dog, Chika-san<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Ahaha, that’s true. What kind of activity does Ophelia like?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>She loves to run around on the beach and play tug of war with a rope. She usually gets tired before I do<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Ophelia seems very active, huh. My Shiitake loves to sleep~. Even when I’m practicing my dance, she would just lay there<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Maybe Shiitake-san isn’t sleeping, but watching you, Chika-san?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0101/>Eeh!? You mean she’s making sure that I don’t slack off!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>N-, not like that. I mean that she’s watching over you while you have fun…. I’m sure it’s like that, Chika-san! Shiitake-san is just watching over you with her warm gaze!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
